message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm looking to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $80.
I understand that $120 is a bit high for you, but I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering the product to you for $100.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $100 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product, can you consider that?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we might not meet in the middle on this one. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm offering the product to you for $95.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit away from my target. I'm willing to pay $92 for the product, can you consider that?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $92, but I need to get a bit more. I'm offering the product to you for $96.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $96, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $94 for the product, can you consider that?
I'm starting to think we're really close now. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm offering the product to you for $97.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but $97 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product, can you consider that?
